fields.description:
We might want a new markup support for {{Ti.UI.Windows.CommandBar}} button items using {{<Items>}} just like [Titanium.UI.iOS.Toolbar|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/Titanium.UI.iOS.Toolbar].

Would be look like this:

{code}
<CommandBar platform="windows" ns="Ti.UI.Windows">
    <Items>
        <AppBarButton ns="Ti.UI.Windows" id="refreshButton"/>
    </Items>
</CommandBar>
{code}

comments.body:
Polyfill is in the 4.1.0 sample app:
https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/appc-sample-ti410/blob/master/app/lib/polyfill.js
